notice.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

goal.ch: 讓學生瞭解生醫工程如何利用生醫系統模型去瞭解人體生理系統及其相關之生理機制；並由實驗中去瞭解與驗證不同的條件下對人體生理系統的影響及預測可能的變化。
goal.en: "The purpose of this course will provide students with the knowledge of physiological systems and its related mechanisms via lecture, oral presentation, and a final project."

outline.ch:
"課程目的: 本課程藉由課堂授課與書報討論及專題實驗方式, 讓學生瞭解生醫工程如何利用生醫系統模型
授課方式: 上課、口頭報告、專題實驗等方式進行.
課程內容: 本課程包含人體心臟、血液循環、腎臟及泌尿、以及肌肉、神經等系統及控制的介紹；學生將閱讀上課講義所提供的相關生醫系統模型之文獻並對該文獻進行口頭報告，此外學生也需選擇相關的生醫系統模型進行專題實驗，並在期末就其專題實驗進行成果報告（包括口頭報告及書面報告）。"
outline.en: "In this semester, we will talk about five major physiological systems: They are the Cardiovascular System, the Respiratory System, Kidney and Renal System, Muscular System, and Nervous System. Finally, the basic concepts of system analysis and mathematical modeling will be introduced and discussed"

textbook.ch:
"自編上課講義

參考書： 
1.Deutsch, S, Understanding the Nervous System: an Engineering Perspective, IEEE Press, 1993; 
2.Rideout, V., Mathematical and Computer Modeling of Physiological Systems, 1991., 
3.Hoppensteadt, F. C., Peskin, C.S., Modeling and Simulation in Medicine and the life sciences, Springer, 
4.Physiological Control Systems: Analysis, Simulation, and Estimation by Michael C. K. Khoo, IEEE Press, 2000
ISBN: 0-7803-3408-6
5.Wijk von Brievingh and Moller Dietmar, Biomedical Modeling and Simulation on a PC : a Workbench for Physiology and Biomedical Engineering(0387976507) New York: Springer-Verlag, 1993
6.Haefner, J. W., Modeling Biological Systems : Principles and Applications (0412042010), New York:Chapman & Hall, 1996, QH308.2
7.Randall, J.E., Microcomputers and Physiological Simulation, 2nd.ed. New York:Raven Press, 1986(QP33.6)
8.Cotterill, R., Computer Simulation in Brain Science, Cambridge:Cambridge University Press, 1988 (QP376)
9.Cherruault, Y., Mathematical Modelling in Biomedicine : Optimal Control of Biomedical Systems (9027721491), Dordrecht, Holland:D. Reidel Pub. Co., 1986(R853.M3)
10.Milhorn, H.T., The application of control theory to physiological systems / Howard T. Milhorn, Jr., Philadelphia : Saunders, 1966.(QH508 M599)
11.Banks, H. T., Modeling and control in the biomedical sciences / H. T. Banks. Berlin ; New York : Springer-Verlag, 1975. (QH324.8 B226)
12.Riggs, D.S., Control theory and physiological feedback mechanisms [by] Douglas S. Riggs. , Baltimore, Williams and Wilkins [1970] (0683072447) (QH508, R51)
13.Grodins, F.S., Control theory and biological systems., New York, Columbia University Press, 1963. (QH508.G74)
14.Biological control systems analysis / by John H. Milsum., New York : McGraw-Hill, [c1966] (QH508 M48 1966)"
textbook.en:
"Handouts are prepared by the instructor.
References： 
1.Deutsch, S, Understanding the Nervous System: an Engineering Perspective, IEEE Press, 1993; 
2.Rideout, V., Mathematical and Computer Modeling of Physiological Systems, 1991., 
3.Hoppensteadt, F. C., Peskin, C.S., Modeling and Simulation in Medicine and the life sciences, Springer, 
4.Physiological Control Systems: Analysis, Simulation, and Estimation by Michael C. K. Khoo, IEEE Press, 2000
ISBN: 0-7803-3408-6

6.Haefner, J. W., Modeling Biological Systems : Principles and Applications (0412042010), New York:Chapman & Hall, 1996, QH308.2
7.Randall, J.E., Microcomputers and Physiological Simulation, 2nd.ed. New York:Raven Press, 1986(QP33.6)
8.Cotterill, R., Computer Simulation in Brain Science, Cambridge:Cambridge University Press, 1988 (QP376)
9.Cherruault, Y., Mathematical Modelling in Biomedicine : Optimal Control of Biomedical Systems (9027721491), Dordrecht, Holland:D. Reidel Pub. Co., 1986(R853.M3)
10.Milhorn, H.T., The application of control theory to physiological systems / Howard T. Milhorn, Jr., Philadelphia : Saunders, 1966.(QH508 M599)
11.Banks, H. T., Modeling and control in the biomedical sciences / H. T. Banks. Berlin ; New York : Springer-Verlag, 1975. (QH324.8 B226)
12.Riggs, D.S., Control theory and physiological feedback mechanisms [by] Douglas S. Riggs. , Baltimore, Williams and Wilkins [1970] (0683072447) (QH508, R51)

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch: 成績計算：出席與參與(10%)、期中考（20%）、文獻報告(20%)、專題實驗口頭(20%)及書面報告(30%)
gradMethod.en:
"Attendance & class participation(10%)、
Midterm(20%)
literature oral presentation(20%)、
Oral presentation (20%)& written reports (30%)for the final project"
